title: Ep. 59 - Why Does A Good God Allow Bad Things?
description:
An atheist asked me how I can believe that God exists, and is good, considering all of the terrible stuff that happens in the world. This, of course, is one of the most common objections people have been making against God for millennia. I think it is worth addressing.
